column4: After sabayon-apply hosed my machine, how can I restore it? Details here: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/sabayon/+bug/592489
I usually start gdm thus: sudo service gdm start
do you think my wireless driver is borked? I dont see how it could be considering iwlist scan sees my network but yet I cant ping the damn router even with a static IP
I don't know too much about wireless troubleshooting. Sorry.
